keyMoments.title: Straw Hats Face Near-Death
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat crew is beaten and crushed by Oars, with Moria ordering their deaths. This represents their darkest moment in the Thriller Bark arc.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew pushed to their absolute limits, requiring Nightmare Luffy's intervention to survive.

keyMoments.title: Rescued by Rolling Pirates
keyMoments.description: The Rolling Pirates tend to the injured Straw Hats while Nightmare Luffy battles their enemies, demonstrating the alliance between the crews.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the bonds formed during the Thriller Bark adventure and the cooperation between pirate crews against a common enemy.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it

keyMoments.title: Rolling Pirates Empower Nightmare Luffy
keyMoments.description: The Rolling Pirates and other Thriller Bark victims previously implanted 100 shadows into Luffy, creating the Nightmare Luffy transformation seen in this episode.
keyMoments.significance: Their sacrifice of shadows enables Luffy to have the power needed to defeat Oars and Moria.

keyMoments.title: Rolling Pirates Rescue Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Under Lola's orders, the Rolling Pirates work to get the heavily injured Straw Hat crew members to safety during the battle.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the strong alliance and mutual support between the two crews.

name.japanese: スリラーバーク海賊団

keyMoments.title: Zombie Soldiers Scatter in Fear
keyMoments.description: When Nightmare Luffy slams Oars into the ground with overwhelming force, all the zombie soldiers watching flee in terror.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the breaking of Moria's zombie army's morale when faced with Nightmare Luffy's power.

keyMoments.title: Moria Attempts Retreat
keyMoments.description: The crew's captain, Gecko Moria, attempts to flee from Nightmare Luffy rather than continue the battle.
keyMoments.significance: Rare moment of a Warlord of the Sea choosing retreat, showing Nightmare Luffy's overwhelming threat level.

ships.description: A massive island-sized ship that serves as the crew's base and fortress.
